caption.p: Effect of RAP (100 and 200 mg/kg) on histological alterations in the liver of LPS-induced systemic inflammation. Normal control rats showing intact hepatocytes and normal histological structure of central vein. LPS treated rats showing multiple focal necrosis, severe damage of hepatic architecture, and damage in hepatocytes. Rats treated with RAP 100 mg/kg + LPS and RAP 200 mg/kg + LPS showing absence of histopatholgical alterations.
